column1: #Text=Last time I checked, this country is still called Canada.
#Text=Who knows how long it'll last given Justin Trudeau's agenda is anyone's guess, but for now Canadians have EVERY RIGHT TO MAKE THE RULES IN THEIR OWN COUNTRY.
#Text=You don't have to be a professor to understand that basic fact.
#Text=If you don't like it, then you're free to leave.
